author: Mariah Gladstone, Amy Rose Spiegel, Sarah Burke, Casey Johnston
title: Here's What You, Personally, Can Do About Climate Change Right Now
description: Real environmental progress will take big, systemic reforms. This Earth Day, here's how to use individual actions to push for structural change.
content: With Earth Day upon us, many of us are considering the role we play in preventing the global environmental catastrophes that climate change has promised. While the ongoing pandemic makes it dangerous to physically protest in the street, there are still ways w… [+10482 chars]
